description.value: Action Cost: 1 [Combat] action Range: 60 feet (must see target) Effect: Curse one enemy. Make opposed check: your Wisdom + Space Mastery vs their Wisdom + Luck ([[/save type=will]]). If you win (more successes), they have Misfortune on their next roll. Rudlu's capricious nature turns against them. Usage: Uses 1 Channel Divinity
